Location.description: Location of the receiver - area, country, e.g. Auckland, New Zealand.

Min Elevation-NOAA.description: The minimum maximum pass elevation to record a pass, e.g. 15.

Min Elevation-METEOR.description: The minimum maximum pass elevation to record a pass, e.g. 15.

Min Elevation-ISS.description: The minimum maximum pass elevation to record a pass, e.g. 15.

Min Elevation-AMSAT.description: The minimum maximum pass elevation to record a pass, e.g. 15.

Pass Highlight Elevation.description: Highlight rows which exceed this maximum pass elevation, e.g. 45.

Pass List Days.description: Number of additional days of pass data to calculate, e.g. 3.

Hide Detail.description: Hide detailed pass information, e.g. UTC date and times.

Link Base.description: Link base directory [only partially implemented - do NOT change], e.g. /wxcapture/.

save .wav files.description: Save .wav files after pass - no will delete them.

email receive output.description: Email output of the receive code. It will be also in the log files if the logging level is debug.

plot thumbnail size.description: Size of the generated plot thumbnail, e.g. 58x68.

last gain.description: Previous SDR gain setting for reference only, e.g. 28.8
Previous SDR gain setting for reference only, e.g. 28.8
Previous SDR gain setting for reference only, e.g. 28.8

thumbnail size.description: Thumbnail image size in pixels, e.g. 800 800

thumbnail quality.description: JPEG quality setting for the thumbnail, should be between 1 and 100, e.g. 75

main image quality.description: JPEG quality setting for the main image, should be between 1 and 100, e.g. 92

image minimum.description: Minimum size of the normal image, below which the pass files will be removed, e.g.150000

tweet.description: Tweet to the configured Twitter account, e.g. yes

Branding.description: Branding text for the top of all NOAA images, can be blank, e.g. Kiwi Weather

Population.description: Minimum population for cities to be shown on the map, e.g. 10000000

thumbnail size.description: Thumbnail image size in pixels, e.g. 300 300

thumbnail quality.description: JPEG quality setting for the thumbnail, should be between 1 and 100, e.g. 75

main image quality.description: JPEG quality setting for the main image, should be between 1 and 100, e.g. 92

last gain.description: Previous SDR gain setting for reference only, e.g. 28.8

sample rate.description: SDR bandwidth in Hz for recording NOAA audio, e.g. 37000

image minimum.description: Minimum size of the normal image, below which the pass files will be removed, e.g. 30000

tweet.description: Tweet to the configured Twitter account, e.g. yes

tweet enhancement.description: Image enhancement to use for the tweet, e.g. mcir-precip

remote user.description: Name of the user on the system where the files are copied to via SCP, e.g. USER.

remote directory.description: Name of the directory on the system where the files are copied to via SCP, e.g. /home/USER/wxcapture/output.

remote host.description: IP address for the system where the files are copied to via SCP, e.g. 10.0.0.1.

tweet to.description: Twitter handle of the account to tweet from, prefixed by an @, e.g. @RaspberryPiNZ.

consumer key.description: Consumer key for the Twitter API credentials as configured in Twitter

consumer secret.description: Consumer secret for the Twitter API credentials as configured in Twitter

access token.description: Access token for the Twitter API credentials as configured in Twitter

access token secret.description: Access token secret for the Twitter API credentials as configured in Twitter
